post.title: Matrix Desktop Enhancements
post.content: I downloaded the cool Matrix animated wallpaper and screen saver that I read about on Sean Alexander’s blog. I thought it was interesting that the animated wallpaper configuration utility has a “Hire the Developer” menu item that basically was a prose version of his resume.
